original_title: Curious George: Sails With The Pirates
overview: Curious George is back with all-new places to explore, things to investigate and mischief to get into. As always, he can use a little help from his friends, including Hundley, Gnocchi, Bill and The Man with the Yellow Hat. Itâ€™s time to set a course for adventure with 8 new shows from the Daytime Emmy award-winning* PBS KIDS TV series in Curious George Sails with the Pirates and Other Curious Capers!
title: Curious George: Sails With The Pirates
